text_block_list.name: Voice from Smartphone
text_block_list.text: 『The excitement from the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe still hasn't died down, but we're getting surprising news!』

text_block_list.name: Voice from Smartphone
text_block_list.text: 『The strongest Uma Musume has decided to enter the Japan Cup, among those involved, it caused quite an uproar!』

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Grass～! It's been a while!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Welcome back, El. Seems like this room will be getting noisy again～

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wow! It's been a while since I've heard such sharp words too!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I need to quickly get used to Japan again, huh!? At any rate, it's been half a year since we've talked!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That's right～, jet lag changing when you eat meals, oh and studying, there's a lot of things you need to do to get back to your normal life, huh～?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nuaaaa～～! Particularly when it comes to studying, I don't want to face that reality!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……Oh and then, you need to quickly get used to Japan's courses again. After all, you promised to run together with us again.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ehehee, it was supposed to be after I became the world's strongest but ……I guess that's changed a little bit, huh……?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……Ehehe……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……El, whatever you think about those results, to me the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 was your best race.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Compared to the El who ran on that big stage, nothing has changed…… you're a rival that helped me stand on my own two feet, and someone I look up to.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That's why I'm so motivated for this 『Japan Cup』. It's a good opportunity to reach for the top, and besides that―

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: For us Japanese Uma Musume that have run together with El, it's a chance to engrave our strength in to the hearts of those from overseas.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……Grass

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: ……Ehehee……go show them! The strength of the rivals that ran together with me!
In the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, Special Week was able to claim victory.
While training for the next race, the 『Japan Cup』, a particular piece of news had made it to Japan.

text_block_list.name: Voice from TV
text_block_list.text: 『On this show, we'll be covering the interview with her, please stay tuned』

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, it's starting!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer
text_block_list.text: About the decision to visit Japan, will you please tell us more!?

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Yes, with pleasure.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: All across the world, various races are taking place. And I have conquered that peak.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: However, in this world, I've learned that there are still many talented Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Suddenly my interest was piqued……that there exist many such talents. And of the strength of the Uma Musume running in Japan's Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: The one that got me fired up, El Condor Pasa, and her contemporaries, Grass Wonder and Special Week.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: Both of whom plan to participate in the 『Japan Cup』, I shall also be participating.

text_block_list.name: Montjeu
text_block_list.text: <I'm looking forward to it>

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: To think the winner of the 『Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe』 would participate herself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: She mentioned Spe-san by name too……

text_block_list.name: Voice from TV
text_block_list.text: 『And moving on, the news of Montjeu's participation, let's hear the reaction of the fans』

text_block_list.name: Voice from TV
text_block_list.text: 『Her battle against El Condor Pasa was amazing, wasn't it!? That Japan's Uma Musume were this strong, it really had me excited!』

text_block_list.name: Voice from TV
text_block_list.text: 『But even so, it was still unfortunate……! That's why, I want Japan's Uma Musume to do their best!]』

text_block_list.name: Voice from TV
text_block_list.text: 『Special Week-san, and Grass Wonder-san― as Japan's Uma Musume, we'll be cheering for you with all we've got!』

text_block_list.name: Voice from TV
text_block_list.text: 『As expected, there are many fans that want revenge against the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume, and have high hopes for Japan's Uma Musume』
By preventing El Condor Pasa's victory, many of Japan's fans had come to know the name Montjeu.
At the news of the Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Uma Musume's participation, Special Week remained calm, watching without looking away.
We'll need to train harder, Spe.
We'll need to train harder, Spe.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!!
And like that, talk of the 『Japan Cup』 heated up all throughout Japan, but then there was sudden news.
――Grass Wonder, was withdrawing from the 『Japan Cup』.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, the sky is already turning red…… Winter is right around the corner, huh～?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Um……well……about the 『Japan Cup』……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I suppose I worked a little bit too hard during training.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: With everyone in Japan talking about it, it became a race on the path to the summit. Running with the opponent that beat El, it was an unbelievable opportunity.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: A way to respond to the fans that wanted Japan's Uma Musume to win, and as a representative of Japan's Uma Musume, I wanted to run.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……and together with Spe-chan

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Me……?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: At the 『Fall Tenno Sho』, your running was truly wonderful.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That's why I was looking forward to running with Spe-chan. Once again running together……I was really……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I really…… wanted to run……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Grass-chan……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: ……Um, listen, Grass-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm going to win.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……eh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I wanted to run with Grass-chan too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And I wanted to win against Montjeu-san and Grass-chan. Because I still haven't won against Grass-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's why I'll win. I― Special Week will prove that I am Japan's strongest Uma Musume.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: And at the 『Arima Kinen』, I'll be waiting for you! As Japan's #1 Uma Musume!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, then I'll need to recover from this injury by then, I need to be in top condition for that, don't I?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: In the 『Japan Cup』, do your best out there. The strength of Japan's Uma Musume, make sure you show the whole world.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: I have high hopes for you, "Supreme Commander of Japan"
